channel.description: math.HO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Cycling along Euler road
item.description: arXiv:2509.10460v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We introduce the notion of $P_{\lambda}$ points, which canonically parametrize points on the Euler line. This allows us to show that the Euler line of any $d$-dimensional inscribed polygon in Euclidean space arises from the Euler lines of its sub-polygons, beginning from the Euler line of a point in the plane. Furthermore, we situate $P_{\lambda}$ points in the literature of modern triangle centers.
item.dc:creator: Dylan Wyrzykowski
